programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2005, A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

MST3K: Women Of The Prehistoric Planet, 19900220000000 +0000, Our intrepid hosts are trapped between Isaac Asimov's Literary Doomsday Device and Robert Ito from Quincy M.E. (1976) in a fur caveman outfit.
MST3K: Zombie Nightmare, 19941124000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: Horrors of Spider Island
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E11, A group of showgirls washes up on a deserted island after their plane crashes. Soon they discover the island is home to a large, radioactive spider.

programme.title: Beginning of the End
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Beginning of the End, S05E17, A swarm of giant grasshoppers, inadvertently created by a radioactive experiment, heads for Chicago.

programme.title: Boggy Creek II: And The Legend Continues
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S11E06, A professor and his students camp out in the rural Arkansas swamp, in hopes of finding a Bigfoot-like creature.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

programme.title: The Brute Man
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Brute Man, S07E02, Rondo Hatton plays a disfigured man, a/k/a The Creeper, who hunts down and kills the people responsible for his deformity.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Sport Parade: Snow Thrills
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E13, A classic newsreel that highlights various winter sports.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.

programme.title: The Starfighters
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Starfighters, S06E12, An Air Force pilot attempts to gain the respect of his father.

programme.title: Blood Waters of Dr. Z
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Blood Waters of Dr. Z, S10E05, Seeking revenge against those responsible for stripping him of his tenure and the denial of human research subjects, Dr. Z mutates himself into a hideous and murderous half-human-half-fish-like creature!
I Do, I Do, I Do, 20150206000000 +0000, An architect (Autumn Reeser) relives her disastrous wedding day over and over until she faces her fears and discovers what she really wants in life.

In My Dreams, 20140420000000 +0000, Natalie and Nick have no luck in romance. After tossing coins into a fountain, the two then begin dreaming about each other. But, according to fountain mythology, they only have a week to turn those dreams into reality.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.

Lucky Christmas, 20111112000000 +0000, Holly Ceroni is devastated when she learns her winning lottery ticket is in her stolen car. But what happens when the man behind it falls for Holly? Stars Elizabeth Berkley and Jason Gray-Stanford.

The Christmas Shepherd, 20141123000000 +0000, Buddy, a German Shepherd born on Christmas Day, means the world to widowed children's author Sally Brown. When a thunderstorm causes Buddy to run away from home, he ends up being adopted by a single father and his daughter.
Christmas with Tucker, 20131125000000 +0000, Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father and is helped through this trying time by his friendship with a dog named Tucker.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20210214000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.

Lead with Your Heart, 20150919000000 +0000, When their parents contemplate splitting up, two teens hatch a scheme to make them realize how much they need each other. Stars Billy Baldwin and Kari Matchett.

Love Under the Stars, 20150816000000 +0000, When a 30-something woman living in an infinite state of youth is finally forced out into the real world, she befriends a young girl and a widower that will teach her that it is okay to grow up. Stars Ashley Newbrough.

Love, Again, 20150621000000 +0000, A couple, on the brink of divorce must work together to plan their daughter's wedding. While they don't want to disrupt their daughter's happiness by announcing their divorce, they must learn to work together.

programme.title: A Hundred Days
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E17, SG-1 visits the friendly planet Edora and gathers to watch the annual meteor shower that lights up the sky like a fiery rain. But suddenly, wayward asteroids bombard the planet, destroying the Stargate. Can O'Neill and the team ever return home?

programme.title: Shades Of Grey
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E18, On a mission to Tollana, O'Neill steals a weapon there and takes it back to Earth. When Hammond discovers the deception, he suspends O'Neill. But O'Neill's misconduct is only the beginning of a deep mystery that could have catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: New Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E19, SG-1 journeys to a planet where their arrival ignites a war between two cultures. A spy realizes his side could win the war if SG-1 and the Stargate can be neutralized. Will O'Neill and his team make the same realization and save themselves in time?

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E20, Bra'tac (Tony Amendola) arrives at Stargate Command with a wild story about interplanetary warfare with Apophis (Peter Williams). Daniel deduces that the battle is over Apophis' child, and races to save the child before Apophis can find him first.

programme.title: Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E21, Daniel finds a crystal skull identical to one first discovered by his grandfather. When Daniel stares into the skull's eyes, a force makes him disappear. Now SG-1 must find his grandfather to unlock the mystery of the skull and bring Daniel home.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: Small Victories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E01, SG-1 is called upon to help a race of gentle, highly-intelligent aliens struggling against a swarm of deadly mechanical spiders called Replicators. But the situation becomes much more complicated when a lone Replicator is discovered back on Earth.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E02, SG-1 responds to a cry for help from a doomed civilization, which promises to give Earthlings access to advanced technology in exchange for supplies that would help them defeat their enemies. But they soon discover that SG-1 may not be helping.

programme.title: Upgrades
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E03, SG-1 is selected to test the effects of alien-tech wristbands on human wearers, and soon find themselves blessed with spectacular strength and speed. But when they are sent on a mission utilizing these new abilities, they learn a shocking lesson.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E04, When a High Priestess from the planet Chulak claims to have a plan that would cripple the Goa'uld, everyone is skeptical. SG-1 must join forces with the Tok'ra in order to put her plan into effect, but a deadly, hidden secret could jeopardize it.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michaels flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E05, After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release an mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the citys technological infrastructure.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKays sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michaels abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E07, Brandon's overprotection alienates Kelly; Donna learns she's been stabbed in the back by Valerie, who juggles her rich man and her poor man on a dinner cruise attended by Steve and Carly.

programme.title: Child Of The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E10, Erica is arrested for prostitution and released into Kelly and Brandon's custody. Jodi claims that Steve is the only man who could have possibly fathered her child. Mel helps David file for bankruptcy and pay back Donna.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E11, Brandon is arrested for obstructing justice. David moves into the office at the After Dark and accidentally starts a fire. Valerie visits Sands and learns that Noah paid off David's debt.

programme.title: Friends In Deed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E12, Dr. Monahan's behavior unnerves Kelly as he checks out her injured shoulder. Valerie warns Noah that he may be in over his head trying to manage the After Dark.

programme.title: Comic Relief
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E13, Dr. Monahan makes inappropriate advances toward Kelly. David and Valerie proceed with their plan to make their exes jealous. Steve performs at the After Dark's comedy showcase.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E15, Dr. Monahan forces Kelly out of the clinic. Brandon and Steve hire a new assistant, Janet Sosna; and bring David aboard as a music reviewer. Valerie cuts a deal with a bookie operating at the After Dark.

programme.title: Illegal Tender
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E16, David tries to make amends after his first music review gets the artist fired; Valerie ignores Noah's decree to halt the sports betting at the club.

programme.title: Crimes & Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E19, Despite meeting Noah, Donna's hospitalized grandmother says Donna's fated mate is David, who moves out of Valerie's room; Kelly alerts Brandon to a potential story about an ex-con; Steve coaxes Brandon into a double date.

programme.title: Law & Disorder
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E22, Noah's civil trial begins. His attorney portrays Valerie as a golddigging tramp, and uses the gang's testimony to place Noah in a favorable light. David's record company experiences a shake-up.

programme.title: Aunt Bea's Pickles
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E25, During Valerie's surprise birthday party, Abby announces that she and Bill are engaged. Brandon receives a job offer from a major newspaper but faces a dilemma when he learns he is only being hired as a replacement for striking reporters.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E27, Image seems to be everything at the gang's five-year high-school reunion, where Valerie creates new personas for herself and David, while Andrea Zuckerman tries to hang on to her old one.

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E29, Kelly finds it impossible to trust Brandon as he works late every night for several weeks. Noah entertains Gwyneth, a longtime friend. David becomes extremely jumpy after being robbed at an ATM.

programme.title: The Fundamental Things Apply
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E30, Brandon and Kelly try to help a Bosnian refugee find his wife; Donna puts on a fashion show; Gwyneth takes a page from Valerie's book after admitting feelings for Noah; Steve learns Sarah is married.

programme.title: Budget Cuts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E02, After learning that the clinic may lose funding, Kelly asks Brandon to write a story to generate publicity. David believes that Valerie killed her father in self-defense and should move on.

programme.title: Dealer's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E03, Abby announces that she and Carl are planning to elope in Las Vegas, and asks Val to be her maid of honor. Kelly begs Val to let her tag along on the trip because she believes that Brandon is seeing someone else.

programme.title: African Croc/11 Yr Old Road
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E331, A boy on a safari is attacked by an alligator while swimming. An 11-year-old takes over driving when her mother loses consciousness.

programme.title: Chance Encounter/Baby Bathtub Burn
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E372, Rescuers search for a missing hiker in a treacherous canyon. A baby is burned when his sister tries to give him a bath.

programme.title: ATV 5 Yr Old/Honeybee Horror
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E371, A 5-year old boy tries to drive a four-wheel ATV and loses control. A man mowing disturbs a nest of 4,000 bees.

programme.title: Arroyo Boy/Whale
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E197, A 14 year old boy is swept into raging waters. Whales beach themselves in Canada and need help returning to water.

programme.title: Uncertified Scuba/Hornet Attack
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E376, An uncertified scuba diver has trouble 80-feet underwater. A man passes out after being stung by a hornet.

programme.title: Suicide Son/Choking Chihuahua
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E320, A 17-year-old attempts suicide after finding his father's gun. A woman finds her pet dog unconscious and not breathing.

programme.title: Sand Tunnel Boy/Arm Save
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E161, A six-year-old becomes trapped in a sand tunnel he was digging at the beach. A teenage hemophiliac collapses

programme.title: Unwanted Intruder/Stranded Octos
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E233, A woman calls 911 while she hides from an intruder. An elderly couple is stranded on a boat for 2 days.

programme.title: Trunk Trapped Tot/Nail Gun Heart
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E250, A 4-year-old is trapped in an unusual place. A man losses his balance on a scaffold and accidentally shoots a coworker in the chest with a nail gun.

programme.title: Big Bear Crash/Breakout Beagle
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E276, A pilot and his passenger are injured when their plane stalls and crashes. A beagle is trapped in an unexpected place.

programme.title: Pick Up Truck/Butane Huffing
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E360, Two children are hurt when a truck crashes into a convenience store. A 15-year old boy passes out after inhaling butane.

programme.title: Mud Trap/Prison EMTs, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E321, Two teenaged girls are injured when their car is struck by a reckless driver. A prison inmate fakes an illness and hijacks an ambulance.

programme.title: Swarm/A Defib Runs Thru It
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E275, A truck driver carrying over 10 million bees loses control. A senior citizen collapses while watching a movie.

programme.title: Denver Chopper
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E138, A television helicopter crew follows a police chase.

programme.title: Gun Shop/Gas Leak Baby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E114, Gun shop owner shot during robbery /4 yr. old calls 911 when mom becomes unconscious

programme.title: Glass Cut Teen/Psychic Cop
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E308, A teenager is seriously injured at home. A patrol car crashes during a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Boomers Rescue/Its a Boy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E255, Police and firefighters search through a burning house to rescue a puppy. A pregnant women goes into labor home alone

programme.title: Pool Neighbor/ATV Barbed Wire
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E359, A toddler is found floating unconscious in the family's pool. A man racing his three-wheel vehicle crashes into barbed wire.

programme.title: Dr. Hays Crush, Part 2/Pea Heimlich
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E312, A man is injured while trying to move a bail of hay with his tractor. A babysitter call 911 when the 4-year-old starts choking.

programme.title: Police Dog Down/Asphalt Trap
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E342, A police dog is caught in the line of fire during a search mission. An asphalt truck over turns trapping the occupants inside.

programme.title: Plowed Under/CPR Baby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E216, A Veteran snow plow operator gets buried by a huge wall of snow. A 13 year old infant suddenly went into convulsions, swallowed her tongue and stopped breathing.

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E377, A woman accidentally trips spilling boiling water on her daughter. A 3-year old boy calls 911 when his pregnant mother faints.

programme.title: The Natural
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E05, A mysterious lifeguard makes rescues around Baywatch, then vanishes. After going over Mitch's head one too many times, Alex gets an annoying new partner.

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E06, April suffers PTSD after losing a rescue victim. Mitch and the victim's widow refused to give up searching for his body. Jessie runs into an old beau who could undermine her future at Baywatch.

programme.title: Hot Summer Night
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E07, Hobie struggles with his irresponsible actions leading to a boating accident that leaves a girl in a coma. Jessie is gripped with fear after April tells her of a recent, job-related tragedy.

programme.title: Swept Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E08, Mitch befriends a boy who joins junior lifeguards in hopes of escaping a brutal home life. Jessie makes a passionate play for JD. Alex auditions for Jeopardy!

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E09, Upset about his failed marriage to Neely, Mitch goes for a day-long tower swim along the beach and encounters problems that distract from his own, including April and Craig's May/December romance, and reluctant heroes Cody and JD.

programme.title: Friends Forever
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E10, A young, hearing-impaired girl learns a lesson in friendship when she, Mitch and Alex protect an orangutan, while Cody and Jessie deal with its abusive owner.

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E11, Cody puts his career, and his life, on the line when he uses a performance-enhancing supplement in hopes of making the Olympic swim team. Alex becomes the object of Mitch's rejection, and Newmie's affection.

programme.title: The Big Blue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E12, Mitch tries to reunite an Army parachutist with her estranged Naval-officer father, while Cody helps a beautiful woman try to reach record-setting depths at a national free-diving competition.

programme.title: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E13, After he tries to save Tanner from his abusive father, Mitch ends up on the wrong side of the law. Meanwhile, Jessie's irresistible charm makes a stunt pilot's heart take flight.

programme.title: Boys will be Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E14, When caught up in a high-risk adventure at sea, Craig tells Mitch a shocking secret. Meanwhile, Jessie works to creatively end JD and Cody's rivalry during a beachside triathlon, and April comes clean with Manny.

programme.title: Baywatch Grand Prix
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E15, Mitch feels the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon Lusk, a race car driver in town for a major competition, visits Baywatch. Meanwhile, Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards that they try to sell it into syndication.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E16, After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: Baywatch Down Under, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E17, While team Baywatch prepares to compete against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home. The competing lifeguards must put their intense rivalry aside to save a life.

programme.title: Water Dance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E18, Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E19, Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

programme.title: Wave Rage
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E20, After Manny suffers a life-altering injury during a rescue, April tries to save him from himself. Neely meets her match in Alex when she tries to discredit Mitch.

programme.title: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S09E21, April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.
